page.title: 10FACILITIES IN CHARLBURY
page.content: Generally, shops in Charlbury sell groceries.If you want a larger shop it is best to go to Witney or Chipping Norton.Most of the shops open at 9.00am and close at 5.30pm. with the exception of the newsagent who opens at 6.00am. In the chemist there is an off license the Co-Op has one too. There is the Corner House in Charlbury which houses the library and it has a museum nearby. Also in the Corner House are kept the props of the Charlbury Amateur Dramatic Society. C.A.D.S. produce plays,pantomimes and musicals. In the centre of Charlbury is the Spendlove Centre which used to be a Secondary school before it closed in 1983.In the Centre is a dentist,a vet, together with football and badminton clubs.There are many clubs and societies in the town.
